about_the_game:
A chess puzzle dating sim set in a world torn asunder by a century-long war—which the Schwarz Kingdom is set to lose until you and your twin are transported from our world and right in the middle of it, each holding a true game changer: magical crowns that give you the power to control the battlefield as a chess board.

In one battle, you turn the tide of the war as you solve for the Schwarz army and defeat the invading marble Weiss soldiers—who, in return, kidnap your twin sibling.

Take the crown and command the Schwarz army, bonding with their officers and royalty, to rescue your sibling and bring an end to the war!

Features:
  • A Magical Chess world, where the pieces are people that you interact with
  • Befriend a Schwarz Knight, Bishop, Rook and the Queen and team up with them in battle
  • A fantastical adventure where your decisions really matter
  • Beginner difficulty for beginners and those new to chess, or if you just want to focus on the story
  • Beginner difficulty focuses on teaching and testing basic chess tactics such as forks, castling, pins, checkmate, and much more
  • Expert difficulty designed for those who want more of a challenge (estimated puzzle ratings 800-1200)
  • Hundreds of hand crafted chess puzzles to find and solve throughout the story
  • Additional Chess gauntlet for a series of selected puzzles to complete

short_description: A fantasy visual novel set in a magical world of chess. Gameplay consists mainly of decision making and chess puzzles that represent what is happening in the story. There is a beginner difficulty for those new to chess and expert difficulty for those who seek more of a challenge.
